sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"看，瞧"之意。
means: gaze ： 指出于羡慕、感兴趣、关心或惊异而长时间目不转睛地看。
glare ： 指用愤恨、凶狠或含敌意的眼光死死看着某人。
stare ： 侧重因惊奇、好奇、粗鲁无礼等而睁大眼睛看。
peer ： 指眯着眼睛仔细地或略为吃力地看。
glance ： 指匆匆地或粗略地一看，侧重心不在焉地、匆忙地看一眼。

word_mean: 凝视，注视：目不转睛地朝一个方向看

sentence.Network_en: Gail was silent for a moment, regarding Harry with his steady gaze.
sentence.Network_cn: 盖尔镇定地注视着哈里，沉默了片刻。

sentence.Network_en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentence.Network_cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentence.Network_en: The interior was shielded from the curious gaze of passersby.
sentence.Network_cn: 屋子内部被挡住了，以防路人好奇地张望。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 黑暗神庙_百度百科 ... 致伤打击（ Hurtful Strike） 凝视（gaze）（ Gaze） 熔火冲撞（ Molten Punch）.
2012年六级高频词汇(1)_百度文库 ... furnish v. 陈设，布置 gaze v. 凝视，注视 gear v. 使适合 n.用具，设.
凝字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 凝听〖 listenattentively〗 凝望〖 gaze〗 凝血酶〖 thrombin〗.
690个英语四级高频词汇 ... garbage n. 垃圾，废物 658. gaze v. 凝视，注视 659. gear n. 齿轮，传动装置 660.

list.abs: 这种是典型的男性凝视(male gaze)的指涉，再加上每一间小房间都刻意布置成一种特定的空间，如沙滩、酒店、诊所和咖啡室等，也 …
导演大概是想从男性注视（male gaze）出发，对照异文化∕本文化和异性恋∕同性恋，不过完全没有经营出来，反而让观众看得迷迷茫 …
哈利波特魔法... ... omen----------------------- 症照 crystal gazing----------- 看水晶球场所 dungeon --------------- 地窖.
glance at 和gaze at 的区别,怎样用_百度知道 ... glance at 提到, 影射 gaze at 盯住 glance 是瞥.
ENGLISH 摘要 - bichuanchao的日志 - 网易博客 ... here's the thing 是这样的. gaze out 向外注视 grimace vi. 扮鬼脸, 作苦相.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: perhaps related to obsolete gaw (see gawk)

entry.def: If you gaze at someone or something, you look steadily at them for a long time, for example because you find them attractive or interesting, or because you are thinking about something else.

example.ex: She stood gazing at herself in the mirror...
example.tran: 她站在那儿，凝视着镜中的自己。

example.ex: Sitting in his wicker chair, he gazed reflectively at the fire...
example.tran: 他坐在藤椅上，若有所思地凝视着炉火。

entry.def: You can talk about someone's gaze as a way of describing how they are looking at something, especially when they are looking steadily at it.

example.ex: The Monsignor turned his gaze from the flames to meet the Colonel's...
example.tran: 这位大人凝视的目光离开火苗，与上校的目光相遇。

example.ex: She felt increasingly uncomfortable under the woman's  steady gaze...
example.tran: 那个女人一直盯着她看，让她觉得愈发不自在了。

entry.def: If someone or something is in the public gaze, they are receiving a lot of attention from the general public.

example.ex: You won't find a couple more in the public gaze than Michael and Lizzie.
example.tran: 没有比迈克尔和莉齐更受人瞩目的夫妇了。

sentences.sentence: "he fixed his paternal gaze on me"
"The students stared at the teacher with amazement"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Displaying...well-turned ankles to the lubricious gaze of the multitude.

auth_sentence.res_content: He needed to vanish from the gaze of his...creditors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He needed to vanish from the gaze of his...creditors.

auth_sentence.content: I would tag around...content to gaze upon him idolatrously.
auth_sentence.res_content: I would tag around...content to gaze upon him idolatrously.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would tag around...content to gaze upon him idolatrously.

sentences.en: The climbers stood on the top of the mountain, gazing at the splendid view.
sentences.cn: 登山队员们站在山顶, 凝视壮丽的景色。

sentences.en: Never in his life had he gazed on such splendor.
sentences.cn: 他生平从没有见过如此辉煌壮丽的场面。

sentences.en: She was the most beautiful woman he had ever gazed upon.
sentences.cn: 她是他见过的最美丽的女子。

sentences.en: We gazed out over the limitless expanse of the desert.
sentences.cn: 我们凝望着那一片漫无边际的沙漠。

jushi.english: Under his intense gaze she felt uncomfortable.
jushi.chinese: 他目不转睛地看着她,使她觉得很不自在。

jushi.english: He stood at gaze when I drew the sketch.
jushi.chinese: 当我画这幅素描时,他站在那里凝视。
